name: @redaksjon/protokoll-osx
description: Native macOS application for Protokoll - intelligent audio transcription

scripts.lint: echo 'Swift linting skipped - consider installing SwiftLint: brew install swiftlint'
scripts.lint:fix: echo 'Swift linting skipped - consider installing SwiftLint: brew install swiftlint && swiftlint --fix'

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Tim O'Brien <tobrien@discursive.com>
